title: A new approach to renormalization group improved gravitational action
authors: Alfio Bonanno, Konstantinos F. Dialektopoulos, Vasilios Zarikas
abstract:
A new gravitational action is presented that could be a fair minimal
description of the effective gravitational action in the context of Asymptotic
Safety. It generates consistent modified Einstein equations where $\Lambda$ and
$G$ are functions of spacetime. In addition, these equations respect, without
any ad hoc choices, the Bianchi identities. We analyse this action in a quantum
cosmology scenario. Furthermore, assuming homogeneous and isotropic spacetime,
the action gives a non singular cosmology with power law inflation. Tensor and
scalar perturbations have been used to constraint the free parameters.
